abstract: Despite worries to the contrary, too-big-to-fail institutions may not be prisoners of their own or regulators’ devices in perpetuity.
snippet: Despite worries to the contrary, too-big-to-fail institutions may not be prisoners of their own or regulators’ devices in perpetuity.
lead_paragraph: General Electric may be the first to find out if it is possible to escape the Hotel California.

headline.main: Dodd-Frank’s Hotel California May Have Exit After All

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
